++ Instances

Instances are iterations of something. They are implemented in two ways.
    * NativeImplementation
    * ImplicitImplementTheUnimplemented: Multiple instances is possible because of NoBrittleData, OrderIndiscriminate and NoAssumptions

++Ideology
    * Single Instance programs against HighStandards

Applications will permit you to:
    * Single/Multiple instance of the [Applications]
    * [Open] Multiple instances of the same [Files]
